pr_title: [KOGITO-3623] - Align Smallrye Messaging version with Quarkus

timeline.message:
[KOGITO-3623] - Align Smallrye Messaging version with Quarkus

Signed-off-by: Ricardo Zanini <zanini@redhat.com>

timeline.author: cristianonicolai
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -110,7 +110,7 @@
     <version.io.prometheus>0.5.0</version.io.prometheus>
     <version.io.restassured>4.3.0</version.io.restassured>
     <version.io.restassured.springboot>3.3.0</version.io.restassured.springboot>    <!-- Manually override to 3.3.0 because Spring boot uses rest-assured-common@3.3.0, otherwise error: The type io.restassured.common.mapper.TypeRef cannot be resolved. It is indirectly referenced from required .class files -->
-    <version.io.smallrye.reactive>2.1.1</version.io.smallrye.reactive>
+    <version.io.smallrye.reactive>2.3.0</version.io.smallrye.reactive>

replies.bodyText: I see, this aligns with Quarkus 1.8, when merging 1.9 we should upgrade to 2.4.0. @evacchi some version checks in here: https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-runtimes/pull/791/files#diff-3498e3e6df3d5289b0a1b25b6d8a452c1ba660d9144ce238b2fa2db2f30e069aR113
replies.author: cristianonicolai
